config.title: Connect to the T-Mobile Home Internet Gateway

wifi24ghz_enable.name: Enable/disable 2.4GHz Wi-Fi
wifi24ghz_enable.description: Enable/disable 2.4GHz Wi-Fi on T-Mobile Home Internet Gateway.

enabled.name: Enabled
enabled.description: Turns on or off the 2.4GHz WiFi. WARNING: Only turn WiFi off if you have a wired connection to your gateway. Gateway will reset if this setting is changed, and may lose communications for a minute or more.

wifi50ghz_enable.name: Enable/disable 5.0GHz Wi-Fi
wifi50ghz_enable.description: Enable/disable 5.0GHz Wi-Fi on T-Mobile Home Internet Gateway.

enabled.name: Enabled
enabled.description: Turns on or off the 5.0GHz WiFi. WARNING: Only turn WiFi off if you have a wired connection to your gateway. Gateway will reset if this setting is changed, and may lose communications for a minute or more.

set_wifi24ghz_power.name: Set 2.4GHz Wi-Fi Transmission Power
set_wifi24ghz_power.description: Set 2.4GHz Wi-Fi transmission power level on T-Mobile Home Internet Gateway.

power_level.name: Transmission Power Level
power_level.description: Transmision power level for 2.4GHz Wi-Fi: full or half power. Gateway will reset if this setting is changed, and may lose communications for a minute or more.

set_wifi50ghz_power.name: Set 5.0GHz Wi-Fi Transmission Power
set_wifi50ghz_power.description: Set 5.0GHz Wi-Fi transmission power level on T-Mobile Home Internet Gateway.

power_level.name: Transmission Power Level
power_level.description: Transmision power level for 5.0GHz Wi-Fi: full or half power. Gateway will reset if this setting is changed, and may lose communications for a minute or more.

set_wifi_ssid.name: Set Wi-Fi SSID
set_wifi_ssid.description: Set Wi-Fi SSID on T-Mobile Home Internet Gateway.
